meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a puppet in movement or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The puppetlike robot moved its arms mechanically.
meanings.sent2: Her puppetlike smile never reached her eyes.
meanings.sent3: The puppetlike scarecrow danced in the wind, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: His puppetlike movements on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The puppetlike marionette danced gracefully on strings.
meanings.sent6: With puppetlike precision, the toy soldier marched across the floor.

meanings.definition: Easily controlled or manipulated by others.
meanings.sent1: She felt puppetlike in the hands of her boss, always following orders.
meanings.sent2: The puppetlike behavior of the crowd showed their blind obedience.
meanings.sent3: The puppetlike cat obeyed every command, even fetching a newspaper.
meanings.sent4: His puppetlike compliance made him an easy target for manipulation.
meanings.sent5: The puppetlike puppeteer controlled the marionette effortlessly.
